"Upstream" refers to the direction of transcription, so this means that the methylation is located upstream of the CTG repeat in the direction of transcription.
6. "normal individuals" - This refers to healthy individuals who do not have the disease being studied.
7. "most of the patients" - This refers to individuals who have the disease being studied.
